name: WIC â€“ Women, Infants & Children
description: WIC is California's nutrition program for pregnant and postpartum women, infants, and children under 5, providing healthy food, nutrition education, breastfeeding support, and healthcare referrals.
fullDescription: WIC is California's nutrition program for pregnant and postpartum women, infants, and children under 5, providing healthy food, nutrition education, breastfeeding support, and healthcare referrals.
whatTheyOffer:
- Monthly benefits for healthy foods (fruits, vegetables, whole grains, milk, eggs)
- Infant formula and baby food
- WIC card accepted at most grocery stores
- Nutrition counseling
- Breastfeeding support and free breast pumps
- Farmers market benefits
- Referrals to healthcare and social services
howToGetIt: Apply online or contact your local WIC office. You'll need proof of income (up to 185% of poverty level), residency, and identity. Pregnant women, new mothers, infants, and children under 5 may qualify.
